-- | conection pool for sql-simple
--   
--   conection pool for sql-simple
@package sql-simple-pool
@version 0.3.0

module Database.Sql.Simple.Pool
data Backend b => Pool b
Pool :: (Pool b) -> Pool b
data PoolConfig
PoolConfig :: Int -> NominalDiffTime -> Int -> PoolConfig
numStripes :: PoolConfig -> Int
idleTime :: PoolConfig -> NominalDiffTime
maxResources :: PoolConfig -> Int
withPool :: (Backend b, MonadBaseControl IO m) => Pool b -> (b -> m a) -> m a
transaction :: Transaction b => Pool b -> (b -> Sql c a) -> Sql c a
instance Typeable1 Pool
instance Typeable PoolConfig
instance Show PoolConfig
instance Backend b => Backend (Pool b)
instance Default PoolConfig
instance Elem * (Pool a) ((':) * a as)
